newsitem.title: UK: Survey sees DMG as top derivatives provider - RISK.
newsitem.headline: Survey sees DMG as top derivatives provider - RISK.

text.p: Deutsche Morgan Grenfell is the top overall provider of derivatives to corporate end-users, according to an annual survey conducted by RISK magazine, RISK said on Wednesday.
"DMG was voted number one provider in nine individual products ranging from simple Deutschemark interest rate swaps to complex structured transactions," RISK said in a statement.
The report polled more than 500 finance directors and treasurers in the U.S. and Europe.
NatWest Markets, which recently lost around 90 million stg trading interest derivatives for its own account, came in second in the survey.

RISK said DMG's rise came at the expense of last year's winner Citibank, which nonetheless dominated the corporate vote in the currency options markets. Citibank won the dollar/mark, dollar/yen and mark/yen categories.
"The survey also showed a clear preference by corporates for banks with local knowledge of the markets," RISK said. "In all but four categories, domestic houses dominated the rankings."
